data.title: 70/60/30 – Congratulations, Lisa & Ken Block!
data.meta_description:
It’s all about the numbers! Lisa and Ken Block threw their signature numbers party for their birthdays and anniversary: 70/60/30 (previous bashes included 60/50/20 and 50/40/10) to the delight of a great number of their friends and family. The Prime Social Rooftop was the location for the soiree, which included dancers from Quixotic, signage on the building, gold balloons, fireworks, delicious fare, and specialty drinks to keep everyone happy and dancing. Congratulations to a couple who knows how to celebrate in style.

[caption id=attachment_63751 align=aligncenter width=831] A Quixotic dancer performed for the guests.[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63766 align=aligncenter width=831] Grant Reves and Ashley Shore, David Freirich, Russ Weltner, Lisa Feingold, Buzzah Feingold, Mike Shteamer, Don Marchi, Mark Reichter, and Dan Bourk[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63752 align=aligncenter width=831] A gorgeous ice sculpture and seafood buffet[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63753 align=aligncenter width=831] Jamie Green, Karen Weltner, Lisa Block, Phyllis Cohen, and Missy and Tim Schaffer[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63754 align=aligncenter width=831] Russ and Debbie Welsh with Ken Block[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63755 align=aligncenter width=831] Carol and David Freirich with Mike and Cathy Schultz[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63756 align=aligncenter width=831] Jeff Rosen, Harry Himmelstein, Eduardo Luckie, Jeff House, Bob Steer, Jody House, Carol Rosen, Becky Krueger, Justin Thompson, Jeff Forgey, and Lance Melber[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63757 align=aligncenter width=831] Florence Bramanti and William Block[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63758 align=aligncenter width=831] Greg and Liz Maday flanked Lisa Block.[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63759 align=aligncenter width=831] The fabulous fireworks display[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63765 align=aligncenter width=831] Lisa and Ken Block, Mark Ebbitts, and Georgina Herrera[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63761 align=aligncenter width=831] (Front row) Chandler Thompson, Karen Weltner, and Rachael Sabates (back row) Georgina Herrera, Betsey Arnold, Linda Haith, Florence Bramanti, Lisa Block, and Cindy Steer[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63760 align=aligncenter width=831] Dancing the night away[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63764 align=aligncenter width=831] Ken and Lisa Block[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63763 align=aligncenter width=831] The Block Family: Andrew Block and Alex Mattoon, William Block, Florence Bramanti, Ken and Lisa Block, Cameron and Mariya Hampton, and Chandler and Justin Thompson[/caption]

 

[caption id=attachment_63762 align=aligncenter width=831] (Center) Ken Block was in a dance off with Colin Winterberger! Watching the fun were Rachael Sabates, Lisa Ebbitts, Colby Sullivan, and Eduardo Luckie.[/caption]



Featured in the December 9, 2023 issue of The Independent. 
Photo Credit: David Riffel
